alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:28AM CDT until June 14 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Franklin County in northwestern Alabama... Southern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1026 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Phil Campbell, or 8 miles northwest of Haleyville, moving east at 45 mph. This storm has a previous history of producing 70 mph winds and 3 inch hail, reported by a storm chaser at at approximately 1020 AM. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville, Moulton, Phil Campbell, Mt Hope, Speake, Tharptown, Duketon, Wren, Landersville and Newburg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Alabama.
